item.search: SELECT media.*,null AS mid FROM media WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY added DESC
SELECT media.*,null AS mid FROM media WHERE active = 1 ORDER BY RANDOM()
SELECT media.*,null AS mid FROM media WHERE active = 1 AND position > 0.0 ORDER BY position DESC
SELECT media.*,null AS mid FROM media WHERE active = 1 AND mediatype = 1 AND views = 0 ORDER BY added DESC
SELECT media.*,null AS mid FROM media WHERE active = 1 AND mediatype <> 1 AND views = 0 ORDER BY added DESC
